source.sqlReaderQuery:
select distinct B_CLASSNAME, B_CREDATE, B_UPDDATE, B_CREATOR, B_PUBID, B_SOURCEID, OPERATIONAL_STATUS, TYPE, ACCOUNT_NUMBER, 
SHIP_TO_NUM, MODEL, VERSION, TIME_ZONE, LOCAL_CURRENCY_CODE, RAW_PHONE, RAW_CS_PHONE, RAW_FAX, SMS_CODE, SOFT_OPEN_DATE,
 GRAND_OPEN_DATE, CLOSE_DATE, AREA_UNIT_OF_MEASURE, BUILDING_SQFT, WAREHOUSE_SQFT, SHOWROOM_SQFT, OFFICE_SQFT, NUM_OF_DOCK_DOORS,
  RETAIL_SYSTEM_NUM, ENTERPRISE_STORE_NUM, F_GOOGLE_ID as location_number, PROSPECT_ID, DMA_ID, DMA, MSA_ID, MSA, MARKET, REGION, DOMESTIC_CATEGORY,
   COUNTRY_CATEGORY, FP_SUPPORTING_WAREHOUSE, 
FS_SUPPORTING_WAREHOUSE,'' as B_DELETETYPE,
cast(Null as datetime) as B_DELETEDATE,
'' as B_DELETEAUTHOR,
cast (Null as uniqueidentifier) as B_DELETEOPERATION,
Unit as Unit_NUMBER
from retail.v_Site_Storemaster_incremental
--where soft_open_date <= CURRENT_DATE
--and  upper(operational_status) ='ACTIVE'

/*
where upper(operational_status) ='ACTIVE'
UNION 

select B_CLASSNAME, B_CREDATE, B_UPDDATE, B_CREATOR, B_PUBID, B_SOURCEID, OPERATIONAL_STATUS, TYPE, ACCOUNT_NUMBER, 
SHIP_TO_NUM, MODEL, VERSION, TIME_ZONE, LOCAL_CURRENCY_CODE, RAW_PHONE, RAW_CS_PHONE, RAW_FAX, SMS_CODE, SOFT_OPEN_DATE,
 GRAND_OPEN_DATE, CLOSE_DATE, AREA_UNIT_OF_MEASURE, BUILDING_SQFT, WAREHOUSE_SQFT, SHOWROOM_SQFT, OFFICE_SQFT, NUM_OF_DOCK_DOORS,
  RETAIL_SYSTEM_NUM, ENTERPRISE_STORE_NUM, F_GOOGLE_ID as location_number, PROSPECT_ID, DMA_ID, DMA, MSA_ID, MSA, MARKET, REGION, DOMESTIC_CATEGORY,
   COUNTRY_CATEGORY, FP_SUPPORTING_WAREHOUSE, 
FS_SUPPORTING_WAREHOUSE,
'SOFT_DELETE' as B_DELETETYPE,
getdate() as B_DELETEDATE,
'Semadmin' as B_DELETEAUTHOR,
cast(newid() as uniqueidentifier) as B_DELETEOPERATION
from retail.v_Site_Storemaster_incremental
where upper(operational_status) ='INACTIVE'
*/

SELECT
--B_sourceid as B_SOURCEID,
'LegalEntity' AS B_CLASSNAME,
GETDATE() AS B_CREDATE,
GETDATE() AS B_UPDDATE,
'semadmin' AS B_CREATOR,
'SSMASTER_STORES' AS B_PUBID,
legal_entity_id AS SEQUENCE_ID,
legal_entity_id AS B_SOURCEID,
name AS NAME,
type AS TYPE,
lic_contact AS LIC_CONTACT,
lic_contact_email AS LIC_CONTACT_EMAIL,
raw_lic_contact_phone AS RAW_LIC_CONTACT_PHONE,
raw_addr_line1 AS RAW_ADDR_LINE1,
raw_addr_line2 AS RAW_ADDR_LINE2,
raw_city AS RAW_CITY,
raw_state AS RAW_STATE,
raw_state_code AS RAW_STATE_CODE,
raw_country AS RAW_COUNTRY,
raw_country_code AS RAW_COUNTRY_CODE,
raw_postal_code AS RAW_POSTAL_CODE,
raw_longitude AS RAW_LONGITUDE,
raw_latitude AS RAW_LATITUDE,
mailing_addr_line1 AS MAILING_ADDR_LINE1,
mailing_addr_line2 AS MAILING_ADDR_LINE2,
mailing_city AS MAILING_CITY,
mailing_state AS MAILING_STATE,
mailing_state_code AS MAILING_STATE_CODE,
mailing_country AS MAILING_COUNTRY,
mailing_country_code AS MAILING_COUNTRY_CODE,
mailing_postal_code AS MAILING_POSTAL_CODE,
os_legal_entity_id AS OS_LEGAL_ENTITY_ID,
company_code AS COMPANY_CODE
FROM [Retail].[v_StoreMaster_Inc_Legal_Entity]
 WITH(NOLOCK)

select HS_OPC_TRACKING_ID,B_CLASSNAME,B_CREDATE,B_UPDDATE,B_CREATOR,B_PUBID,B_SOURCEID,OPERATION_ID,
ltrim(PRIMARY_PROFIT_CENTER,'0') as PRIMARY_PROFIT_CENTER,
--ltrim(PRIMARY_PROFIT_CENTER,'0') as PRIMARY_PROFIT_CENTER
ERP_DATABASE_NAME,ERP_SYSTEM_NAME,EFFECTIVE_START_DATE,EFFECTIVE_END_DATE,LEGACY_LOCATION_ID,SITE_NAME,COMP_FLAG,ENTERPRISE_FLAG,TRAFFIC_SYSTEM_ID,
LIC_TERRITORY,TUA_EXPIRATION_DATE,NOTES,OS_ID,OS_LOCATION_ID,SITE_RAW_ADDR_LINE1,SITE_RAW_ADDR_LINE2,SITE_RAW_CITY,SITE_RAW_STATE,SITE_RAW_STATE_CODE,
SITE_RAW_POSTAL_CODE,SITE_RAW_COUNTRY,SITE_RAW_COUNTRY_CODE,
SITE_RAW_LATITUDE,SITE_RAW_LONGITUDE,--F_LEGAL_ENTITY_ID,
 Salesmanager1 as Sales_Manager1,
	 Salesmanager2 as Sales_Manager2,
	 Salesmanager3 as Sales_Manager3,
	 Store_manager,Status,
FP_SITE_ID,FS_SITE_ID,
 FP_LEGAL_ENTITY,
	 FS_LEGAL_ENTITY from (
SELECT 
    cast(newid() as uniqueidentifier) HS_OPC_TRACKING_ID,
    B_CLASSNAME,
	B_CREDATE,
	B_UPDDATE,
	B_CREATOR,
	B_PUBID,
	B_SOURCEID,
	 operation_id AS OPERATION_ID,
	 primary_profit_center AS PRIMARY_PROFIT_CENTER,
	 erp_database_name AS ERP_DATABASE_NAME,
	 erp_system_name AS ERP_SYSTEM_NAME,
	 effective_start_date AS EFFECTIVE_START_DATE,
	 effective_end_date AS EFFECTIVE_END_DATE,
	 legacy_location_id AS LEGACY_LOCATION_ID,
	 site_name AS SITE_NAME,
	 CAST(comp_flag AS BIT) AS COMP_FLAG,
	 CAST(enterprise_flag AS BIT) AS ENTERPRISE_FLAG,
	 traffic_system_id AS TRAFFIC_SYSTEM_ID,
	 lic_territory AS LIC_TERRITORY,
	 tua_expiration_date AS TUA_EXPIRATION_DATE,
	 notes AS NOTES,
	 os_id AS OS_ID,
	 os_location_id AS OS_LOCATION_ID,
	 raw_addr_line1 AS SITE_RAW_ADDR_LINE1,
	 raw_addr_line2 AS SITE_RAW_ADDR_LINE2,
	 raw_city AS SITE_RAW_CITY,
	 raw_state AS SITE_RAW_STATE,
	 raw_state_code AS SITE_RAW_STATE_CODE,
	 raw_postal_code AS SITE_RAW_POSTAL_CODE,
	 raw_country AS SITE_RAW_COUNTRY,
	 raw_country_code AS SITE_RAW_COUNTRY_CODE,
	 raw_latitude AS SITE_RAW_LATITUDE,
	 raw_longitude AS SITE_RAW_LONGITUDE,
	 --legal_entity_id AS F_LEGAL_ENTITY_ID,
	 FP_SITE_ID,
	 FS_SITE_ID ,
	 FP_LEGAL_ENTITY,
	 --FS_LEGAL_ENTITY,
	 legal_entity_id as FS_LEGAL_ENTITY,
	 Salesmanager1,
	 Salesmanager2,
	 Salesmanager3,
	 Store_manager,
	 status,
     ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY B_SOURCEID ORDER BY effective_start_date DESC, effective_end_date asc) AS rn     
FROM Retail.v_hs_opc_tracking_incremental)a
where rn=1
--and effective_start_date <= Current_date
--and upper(Status)='ACTIVE'

DECLARE @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT DECIMAL
EXECUTE [dbo].[GET_NEW_LOADID]
@RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT OUTPUT
,@P_DATA_LOCATION_NAME = 'Retail_SiteMaster'
,@P_PROGRAM_NAME = 'RetailSiteDataLoad'
,@P_LOAD_DESCRIPTION = 'RetailSiteDataLoad'
,@P_USERNAME = 'semadmin'
SELECT @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT AS RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT

SELECT
legal_entity_id as B_SOURCEID,
'LegalEntity' AS B_CLASSNAME,
GETDATE() AS B_CREDATE,
GETDATE() AS B_UPDDATE,
'semadmin' AS B_CREATOR,
'SSMASTER_STORES' AS B_PUBID,
legal_entity_id AS LEGAL_ENTITY_ID,
name AS NAME,
type AS TYPE,
lic_contact AS LIC_CONTACT,
lic_contact_email AS LIC_CONTACT_EMAIL,
raw_lic_contact_phone AS RAW_LIC_CONTACT_PHONE,
raw_addr_line1 AS RAW_ADDR_LINE1,
raw_addr_line2 AS RAW_ADDR_LINE2,
raw_city AS RAW_CITY,
raw_state AS RAW_STATE,
raw_state_code AS RAW_STATE_CODE,
raw_country AS RAW_COUNTRY,
raw_country_code AS RAW_COUNTRY_CODE,
raw_postal_code AS RAW_POSTAL_CODE,
raw_longitude AS RAW_LONGITUDE,
raw_latitude AS RAW_LATITUDE,
mailing_addr_line1 AS MAILING_ADDR_LINE1,
mailing_addr_line2 AS MAILING_ADDR_LINE2,
mailing_city AS MAILING_CITY,
mailing_state AS MAILING_STATE,
mailing_state_code AS MAILING_STATE_CODE,
mailing_country AS MAILING_COUNTRY,
mailing_country_code AS MAILING_COUNTRY_CODE,
mailing_postal_code AS MAILING_POSTAL_CODE,
os_legal_entity_id AS OS_LEGAL_ENTITY_ID,
company_code AS COMPANY_CODE
--'1' as Current_flag
FROM [Retail].[v_StoreMaster_Inc_Legal_Entity]
 WITH(NOLOCK)

select distinct B_CLASSNAME, B_CREDATE, B_UPDDATE, B_CREATOR, B_PUBID, B_SOURCEID, OPERATIONAL_STATUS, TYPE, ACCOUNT_NUMBER, 
SHIP_TO_NUM, MODEL, VERSION, TIME_ZONE, LOCAL_CURRENCY_CODE, RAW_PHONE, RAW_CS_PHONE, RAW_FAX, SMS_CODE, SOFT_OPEN_DATE,
 GRAND_OPEN_DATE, CLOSE_DATE, AREA_UNIT_OF_MEASURE, BUILDING_SQFT, WAREHOUSE_SQFT, SHOWROOM_SQFT, OFFICE_SQFT, NUM_OF_DOCK_DOORS,
  RETAIL_SYSTEM_NUM, ENTERPRISE_STORE_NUM, F_GOOGLE_ID, PROSPECT_ID, DMA_ID, DMA, MSA_ID, MSA, MARKET, REGION, DOMESTIC_CATEGORY, 
  COUNTRY_CATEGORY, FP_SUPPORTING_WAREHOUSE, FS_SUPPORTING_WAREHOUSE, 
change_type, record_insert_date, record_update_date,unit
from retail.v_Site_Storemaster_incremental
where upper(operational_status) ='ACTIVE'

select --cast(newid() as uniqueidentifier) HS_OPC_TRACKING_ID,
B_CLASSNAME,B_CREDATE,B_UPDDATE,B_CREATOR,B_PUBID,B_SOURCEID,OPERATION_ID,
ltrim(PRIMARY_PROFIT_CENTER,'0') as PRIMARY_PROFIT_CENTER,
--ltrim(PRIMARY_PROFIT_CENTER,'0') as PRIMARY_PROFIT_CENTER
ERP_DATABASE_NAME,ERP_SYSTEM_NAME,EFFECTIVE_START_DATE,EFFECTIVE_END_DATE,LEGACY_LOCATION_ID,SITE_NAME,COMP_FLAG,ENTERPRISE_FLAG,TRAFFIC_SYSTEM_ID,LIC_TERRITORY,TUA_EXPIRATION_DATE,NOTES,OS_ID,OS_LOCATION_ID,SITE_RAW_ADDR_LINE1,SITE_RAW_ADDR_LINE2,SITE_RAW_CITY,SITE_RAW_STATE,SITE_RAW_STATE_CODE,SITE_RAW_POSTAL_CODE,SITE_RAW_COUNTRY,SITE_RAW_COUNTRY_CODE,
SITE_RAW_LATITUDE,SITE_RAW_LONGITUDE,F_LEGAL_ENTITY_ID,
 Salesmanager1 as Sales_Manager1,
	 Salesmanager2 as Sales_Manager2,
	 Salesmanager3 as Sales_Manager3,
	 Store_manager,Status,
FP_SITE_ID,FS_SITE_ID from (
SELECT 
    --cast(newid() as uniqueidentifier) HS_OPC_TRACKING_ID,
    B_CLASSNAME,
	B_CREDATE,
	B_UPDDATE,
	B_CREATOR,
	B_PUBID,
	B_SOURCEID,
	 operation_id AS OPERATION_ID,
	 primary_profit_center AS PRIMARY_PROFIT_CENTER,
	 erp_database_name AS ERP_DATABASE_NAME,
	 erp_system_name AS ERP_SYSTEM_NAME,
	 effective_start_date AS EFFECTIVE_START_DATE,
	 effective_end_date AS EFFECTIVE_END_DATE,
	 legacy_location_id AS LEGACY_LOCATION_ID,
	 site_name AS SITE_NAME,
	 CAST(comp_flag AS BIT) AS COMP_FLAG,
	 CAST(enterprise_flag AS BIT) AS ENTERPRISE_FLAG,
	 traffic_system_id AS TRAFFIC_SYSTEM_ID,
	 lic_territory AS LIC_TERRITORY,
	 tua_expiration_date AS TUA_EXPIRATION_DATE,
	 notes AS NOTES,
	 os_id AS OS_ID,
	 os_location_id AS OS_LOCATION_ID,
	 raw_addr_line1 AS SITE_RAW_ADDR_LINE1,
	 raw_addr_line2 AS SITE_RAW_ADDR_LINE2,
	 raw_city AS SITE_RAW_CITY,
	 raw_state AS SITE_RAW_STATE,
	 raw_state_code AS SITE_RAW_STATE_CODE,
	 raw_postal_code AS SITE_RAW_POSTAL_CODE,
	 raw_country AS SITE_RAW_COUNTRY,
	 raw_country_code AS SITE_RAW_COUNTRY_CODE,
	 raw_latitude AS SITE_RAW_LATITUDE,
	 raw_longitude AS SITE_RAW_LONGITUDE,
	 legal_entity_id AS F_LEGAL_ENTITY_ID,
	 FP_SITE_ID,
	 FS_SITE_ID ,
	 Salesmanager1,
	 Salesmanager2,
	 Salesmanager3,
	 Store_manager,
	 status,
     ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY B_SOURCEID ORDER BY effective_start_date DESC, effective_end_date asc) AS rn     
FROM Retail.v_hs_opc_tracking_incremental)a
where rn=1
and upper(Status)='ACTIVE'
--and effective_start_date <= Current_date

select distinct B_CLASSNAME, B_CREDATE, B_UPDDATE, B_CREATOR, B_PUBID, B_SOURCEID, OPERATIONAL_STATUS, TYPE, ACCOUNT_NUMBER, 
SHIP_TO_NUM, MODEL, VERSION, TIME_ZONE, LOCAL_CURRENCY_CODE, RAW_PHONE, RAW_CS_PHONE, RAW_FAX, SMS_CODE, SOFT_OPEN_DATE,
 GRAND_OPEN_DATE, CLOSE_DATE, AREA_UNIT_OF_MEASURE, BUILDING_SQFT, WAREHOUSE_SQFT, SHOWROOM_SQFT, OFFICE_SQFT, NUM_OF_DOCK_DOORS,

FS_SUPPORTING_WAREHOUSE,'' as B_DELETETYPE,
cast(Null as datetime) as B_DELETEDATE,
'' as B_DELETEAUTHOR,

where soft_open_date <= CURRENT_DATE
and  upper(operational_status) ='ACTIVE'

select B_CLASSNAME, B_CREDATE, B_UPDDATE, B_CREATOR, B_PUBID, B_SOURCEID, OPERATIONAL_STATUS, TYPE, ACCOUNT_NUMBER, 
SHIP_TO_NUM, MODEL, VERSION, TIME_ZONE, LOCAL_CURRENCY_CODE, RAW_PHONE, RAW_CS_PHONE, RAW_FAX, SMS_CODE, SOFT_OPEN_DATE,
 GRAND_OPEN_DATE, CLOSE_DATE, AREA_UNIT_OF_MEASURE, BUILDING_SQFT, WAREHOUSE_SQFT, SHOWROOM_SQFT, OFFICE_SQFT, NUM_OF_DOCK_DOORS,
  RETAIL_SYSTEM_NUM, ENTERPRISE_STORE_NUM, F_GOOGLE_ID as location_number, PROSPECT_ID, DMA_ID, DMA, MSA_ID, MSA, MARKET, REGION, DOMESTIC_CATEGORY,

cast(newid() as uniqueidentifier) as B_DELETEOPERATION
from retail.v_Site_Storemaster_incremental
where upper(operational_status) ='INACTIVE'

'LegalEntity' AS B_CLASSNAME,
GETDATE() AS B_CREDATE,
GETDATE() AS B_UPDDATE,
'semadmin' AS B_CREATOR,
'SMARTSHEET' AS B_PUBID,
legal_entity_id AS LEGAL_ENTITY_ID,
name AS NAME,

raw_state AS RAW_STATE,

raw_country_code AS RAW_COUNTRY_CODE,
raw_postal_code AS RAW_POSTAL_CODE,
raw_longitude AS RAW_LONGITUDE,
raw_latitude AS RAW_LATITUDE,
mailing_addr_line1 AS MAILING_ADDR_LINE1,
mailing_addr_line2 AS MAILING_ADDR_LINE2,
mailing_city AS MAILING_CITY,
mailing_state AS MAILING_STATE,
mailing_state_code AS MAILING_STATE_CODE,
mailing_country AS MAILING_COUNTRY,

os_legal_entity_id AS OS_LEGAL_ENTITY_ID,
company_code AS COMPANY_CODE

B_CLASSNAME,
B_CREDATE,
B_UPDDATE,
B_CREATOR,
B_PUBID,
SITE_ADDITIONAL_INFO_ID,
opr_monday_start_time AS OPR_MONDAY_START_TIME,
opr_monday_end_time AS OPR_MONDAY_END_TIME,

opr_tuesday_end_time AS OPR_TUESDAY_END_TIME,

opr_sunday_start_time AS OPR_SUNDAY_START_TIME,
opr_sunday_end_time AS OPR_SUNDAY_END_TIME
--change_type
FROM Retail.v_SiteAdditionalInfo_Incremental WITH(NOLOCK)

select HS_OPC_TRACKING_ID,B_CLASSNAME,B_CREDATE,B_UPDDATE,B_CREATOR,B_PUBID,B_SOURCEID,OPERATION_ID,
ltrim(PRIMARY_PROFIT_CENTER,'0') as PRIMARY_PROFIT_CENTER,
--ltrim(PRIMARY_PROFIT_CENTER,'0') as PRIMARY_PROFIT_CENTER

	 Salesmanager2 as Sales_Manager2,

	 tua_expiration_date AS TUA_EXPIRATION_DATE,
	 notes AS NOTES,
	 os_id AS OS_ID,
	 os_location_id AS OS_LOCATION_ID,
	 raw_addr_line1 AS SITE_RAW_ADDR_LINE1,
	 raw_addr_line2 AS SITE_RAW_ADDR_LINE2,
	 raw_city AS SITE_RAW_CITY,
	 raw_state AS SITE_RAW_STATE,
	 raw_state_code AS SITE_RAW_STATE_CODE,
	 raw_postal_code AS SITE_RAW_POSTAL_CODE,
	 raw_country AS SITE_RAW_COUNTRY,

	 raw_latitude AS SITE_RAW_LATITUDE,
	 raw_longitude AS SITE_RAW_LONGITUDE,
	 legal_entity_id AS F_LEGAL_ENTITY_ID,
	 FP_SITE_ID,
	 FS_SITE_ID ,
	 Salesmanager1,
	 Salesmanager2,
	 Salesmanager3,
	 Store_manager,
	 status,
     ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY B_SOURCEID ORDER BY effective_start_date DESC, effective_end_date asc) AS rn     
FROM Retail.v_hs_opc_tracking_incremental)a
where rn=1
and upper(Status)='ACTIVE'

WITH RankedRecords AS (
    SELECT 
        cast(newid() as uniqueidentifier) AS WH_LE_TRACKING_ID,
        site_id as B_sourceid,
        'WarehouseLegalEntityTracking' as B_CLASSNAME,
        GETDATE() AS B_CREDATE,
        GETDATE() AS B_UPDDATE,
        'semadmin' AS B_CREATOR,
        CAST(effective_start_date AS DATE) AS EFFECTIVE_START_DATE,
        site_name AS SITE_NAME,
        notes AS NOTES,
        legacy_location_id AS LEGACY_LOCATION_ID,
        os_id AS OS_ID,
        os_location_id AS OS_LOCATION_ID,
        raw_addr_line1 AS SITE_RAW_ADDR_LINE1,
        raw_addr_line2 AS SITE_RAW_ADDR_LINE2,
        raw_city AS SITE_RAW_CITY,
        raw_state AS SITE_RAW_STATE,
        raw_state_code AS SITE_RAW_STATE_CODE,
        raw_postal_code AS SITE_RAW_POSTAL_CODE,
        raw_country AS SITE_RAW_COUNTRY,
        raw_country_code AS SITE_RAW_COUNTRY_CODE,
        raw_latitude AS SITE_RAW_LATITUDE,
        raw_longitude AS SITE_RAW_LONGITUDE,
        --legal_entity_id AS F_LEGAL_ENTITY_ID,
        'SSMASTER_RDC' AS B_PUBID,
        'SSMASTER_RDC' AS FP_SITE_ID,
        site_id AS FS_SITE_ID,
        'SSMASTER_RDC' AS FP_LEGAL_ENTITY,
        legal_entity_id AS FS_LEGAL_ENTITY,
        status,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (
            PARTITION BY site_id 
            ORDER BY 
                CASE 
                    WHEN status = 'Active' THEN 1 
                    WHEN status = 'Inactive' THEN 2 
                    ELSE 3 
                END,
                effective_start_date DESC
        ) as rn
    FROM Retail.v_wh_le_tracking_inc
)
SELECT 
    WH_LE_TRACKING_ID,
    B_sourceid,
    B_CLASSNAME,
    B_CREDATE,
    B_UPDDATE,
    B_CREATOR,
    EFFECTIVE_START_DATE,
    SITE_NAME,
    NOTES,
    LEGACY_LOCATION_ID,
    OS_ID,
    OS_LOCATION_ID,
    SITE_RAW_ADDR_LINE1,
    SITE_RAW_ADDR_LINE2,
    SITE_RAW_CITY,
    SITE_RAW_STATE,
    SITE_RAW_STATE_CODE,
    SITE_RAW_POSTAL_CODE,
    SITE_RAW_COUNTRY,
    SITE_RAW_COUNTRY_CODE,
    SITE_RAW_LATITUDE,
    SITE_RAW_LONGITUDE,
    --F_LEGAL_ENTITY_ID,
    B_PUBID,
    FP_SITE_ID,
    FS_SITE_ID,
    FP_LEGAL_ENTITY,
    FS_LEGAL_ENTITY,
    status
FROM RankedRecords
WHERE rn = 1
--and upper(status)='ACTIVE'
;

DECLARE @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT DECIMAL
EXECUTE [dbo].[GET_NEW_LOADID]
@RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT OUTPUT
,@P_DATA_LOCATION_NAME = 'Retail_SiteMaster'
,@P_PROGRAM_NAME = 'RetailSiteDataLoad'

SELECT 
'Site' AS B_CLASSNAME,
GETDATE() AS B_CREDATE,
GETDATE() AS B_UPDDATE,
'semadmin' AS B_CREATOR,
'INITIALLOAD' AS B_PUBID,
site_id AS B_SOURCEID,
operational_status AS OPERATIONAL_STATUS,
type AS TYPE,
account_num AS ACCOUNT_NUMBER,
ship_to_num AS SHIP_TO_NUM,
model AS MODEL,
version AS VERSION,
time_zone AS TIME_ZONE,
local_currency_code  AS LOCAL_CURRENCY_CODE,
raw_phone AS RAW_PHONE,
raw_cs_phone AS RAW_CS_PHONE,
raw_fax AS RAW_FAX,
sms_code AS SMS_CODE,
soft_open_date AS SOFT_OPEN_DATE,
grand_open_date AS GRAND_OPEN_DATE,
close_date AS CLOSE_DATE,
area_unit_of_measure AS AREA_UNIT_OF_MEASURE,
building_sqft AS BUILDING_SQFT,
warehouse_sqft AS WAREHOUSE_SQFT,
showroom_sqft AS SHOWROOM_SQFT,
office_sqft AS OFFICE_SQFT,
num_of_dock_doors AS NUM_OF_DOCK_DOORS,
retail_system_num AS RETAIL_SYSTEM_NUM, 
enterprise_store_num AS ENTERPRISE_STORE_NUM,
google_id AS F_GOOGLE_ID,
prospect_id  AS PROSPECT_ID,
CAST(dma_id AS DECIMAL(17,0)) AS DMA_ID, 
dma AS DMA,
msa_id AS MSA_ID,
msa AS MSA,
market AS MARKET,
region AS REGION,
domestic_category AS DOMESTIC_CATEGORY,
country_category AS COUNTRY_CATEGORY,
CASE WHEN warehouse_account_ship_to IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE 'INITIALLOAD' END as FP_SUPPORTING_WAREHOUSE,
warehouse_account_ship_to AS FS_SUPPORTING_WAREHOUSE
FROM Retail.v_site WITH(NOLOCK)

DECLARE @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT DECIMAL
EXECUTE [dbo].[GET_NEW_LOADID]
@RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT OUTPUT
,@P_DATA_LOCATION_NAME = 'Wholesale_SiteMaster'

,@P_LOAD_DESCRIPTION = 'SiteMasterLoad'

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select 
case when CITY_ABBREVIATION is not null then 
left(CITY_ABBREVIATION,10) 
else '' end as zipZctyab
,left(CITY_NAME,25) as zipZctynm
,case when COUNTRY_CODE='US' then 'USA' else COUNTRY_CODE end as zipZcountry
,right(FIPS_Code,3) as zipZconyn
,case when IS_PREFERRED_CITY_NAME='True' then 1
else 0 end as zipPreferred
,cast(Latitude as decimal(7,4) )as zipLat
,cast(Longitude as decimal(8,4))as zipLong
,case when MSA_CODE is not null then MSA_CODE
else '' end
as zipMSA
,case when OBSERVES_DST=1 then 'Y' 
else 'N' end as zipDayLightSavings
,right(replicate('0',5)+ convert(varchar(5),POSTAL_CODE),5) as 
 zipZzipcd
,POSTAL_CODE_TYPE as zipType
,STATE_OR_PROVINCE_CODE as zipZstate
,case when Time_Zone='UTC-03:00' then 'EST+2'
 when Time_Zone='UTC-03:30' then 'NST'
 when Time_Zone='UTC-04:00' then 'EST+1'
 when Time_Zone='UTC-05:00' then 'EST'
 when Time_Zone='UTC-06:00' then 'CST'
 when Time_Zone='UTC-07:00' then 'MST'
 when Time_Zone='UTC-08:00' then 'PST'
 when Time_Zone='UTC-09:00' then 'PST-1'
 when Time_Zone='UTC-10:00' then 'PST-2'
 when Time_Zone='UTC-11:00' then 'PST-3'
 when Time_Zone='UTC+01:00' then 'GMT+1'
 when Time_Zone='UTC+09:00' then 'PST-7'
 when Time_Zone='UTC+10:00' then 'PST-6'
